PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_BuildingUse
PropertySetDef.Definition: Provides information on on the real estate context of the building of interest both current and anticipated.

PropertyDef.Name: MarketCategory
PropertyDef.Definition: Category of use e.g. residential, commercial, recreation etc.

PropertyDef.Name: MarketSubCategory
PropertyDef.Definition: Subset of category of use e.g. multi-family, 2 bedroom, low rise.

PropertyDef.Name: PlanningControlStatus
PropertyDef.Definition: Label of zoning category or class, or planning control category for the site or facility.

PropertyDef.Name: NarrativeText
PropertyDef.Definition: Added information relating to the adjacent building use that is not appropriate to the general descriptive text associated with an entity through the inherited IfcRoot.Description.

PropertyDef.Name: VacancyRateInCategoryNow
PropertyDef.Definition: Percentage of vacancy found in the particular category currently.

PropertyDef.Name: TenureModesAvailableNow
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the tenure modes that are currently available expressed in terms of IfcLabel.

PropertyDef.Name: MarketSubCategoriesAvailableNow
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the sub categories of property that are currently available expressed in terms of IfcLabel.

PropertyDef.Name: RentalRatesInCategoryNow
PropertyDef.Definition: Range of the cost rates for property currently available in the required category.

PropertyDef.Name: VacancyRateInCategoryFuture
PropertyDef.Definition: Percentage of vacancy found in the particular category expected in the future.

PropertyDef.Name: TenureModesAvailableFuture
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the tenure modes that are expected to be available in the future expressed in terms of IfcLabel.

PropertyDef.Name: MarketSubCategoriesAvailableFuture
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the sub categories of property that are expected to be available in the future expressed in terms of IfcLabel.

PropertyDef.Name: RentalRatesInCategoryFuture
PropertyDef.Definition: Range of the cost rates for property expected to be available in the future in the required category.
